channel.title: 登录 on 烂杯的博客
channel.description: Recent content in 登录 on 烂杯的博客

item.title: 六维空间自动登录脚本
item.description: 开篇 5.20前后几天, 六维空间开放注册, 于是久仰大名的我也跑去注册了一个账号, 因为六维空间每日登录都会送5浮云, 因此就有了写一个模拟登录拿每日奖励的脚本的想法, 将其放在校园网登录脚本里面一起跑就美滋滋了. 代码 # -*- coding: utf-8 -*- # author: Chan import requests from bs4 import BeautifulSoup url_start = 'http://bt.neu6.edu.cn/member.php?mod=logging&action=login&referer=http%3A%2F%2Fbt.neu6.edu.cn%2Fforum.php' url_login = 'http://bt.neu6.edu.cn/' url_main = 'http://bt.neu6.edu.cn/forum.php' url_test = 'http://bt.neu6.edu.cn/home.php?mod=spacecp' class neu6(): def __init__(self, username, password): headers = { "Accept": "text/html, application/xhtml+xml, application/xml", "Accept-Encoding": "gzip, deflate", "Accept-Language": "zh-CN, zh", "Cache-Control": "max-age = 0", "Connection": "keep-alive", "Host": "bt.neu6.edu.cn", "Upgrade-Insecure-Requests": "1", "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0Win64x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/66.
